pageProps.headTitle: Clarity Hub Infer API - idmontie's Portfolio

project.title: Clarity Hub Infer API

frontmatter.title: Clarity Hub Infer API
frontmatter.description: NLP infer API to create and label utterances.

project.contentRaw:
The Clarity Hub Infer API provides a fast and intuitive way to create, manage, and deploy NLP models based on labelling utterances.

This API used the Universal Sentence Encoder (USE) to create embeddings from utterances, then used cosine similarity to find the most similar utterances to a given utterance.
project.contentHTML:
The Clarity Hub Infer API provides a fast and intuitive way to create, manage, and deploy NLP models based on labelling utterances.

This API used the Universal Sentence Encoder (USE) to create embeddings from utterances, then used cosine similarity to find the most similar utterances to a given utterance.
project.excerptRaw: The Clarity Hub Infer API provides a fast and intuitive way to create, manage, and deploy NLP models based on labelling utterances.
project.excerptHTML: The Clarity Hub Infer API provides a fast and intuitive way to create, manage, and deploy NLP models based on labelling utterances.

next.title: Clairvoyance

frontmatter.title: Clairvoyance
frontmatter.description: Clairvoyance (renamed to Clarity Hub) finds the best answers that have worked in the past and suggests them to teams using Intercom when answering similar questions.

next.contentRaw:
Clairvoyance finds the best answers that have worked in the past and suggests them to teams using Intercom when answering similar questions.

Clairvoyance was built on AWS using S3, SNS, SQS, RDS, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, and React. We created a webapp, extensions, and a microservice backend to bring real time suggestions to customer success agents using Intercom.
next.contentHTML:
Clairvoyance finds the best answers that have worked in the past and suggests them to teams using Intercom when answering similar questions.

Clairvoyance was built on AWS using S3, SNS, SQS, RDS, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, and React. We created a webapp, extensions, and a microservice backend to bring real time suggestions to customer success agents using Intercom.
next.excerptRaw: Clairvoyance finds the best answers that have worked in the past and suggests them to teams using Intercom when answering similar questions.
next.excerptHTML: Clairvoyance finds the best answers that have worked in the past and suggests them to teams using Intercom when answering similar questions.

previous.title: Dark Emblem
previous.contentRaw:
Dark Emblem was a WAX Blockchain project that used Smart Contracts and AtomicAssets
to create an interactive Card Game on the blockchain. Users could purchase packs
with WAX, open those packs through the UI, and dynamically created images for
each NFT would be created.
previous.contentHTML: Dark Emblem was a WAX Blockchain project that used Smart Contracts and AtomicAssets to create an interactive Card Game on the blockchain. Users could purchase packs with WAX, open those packs through the UI, and dynamically created images for each NFT would be created.
